attributes.action: Ask the Queen to rename Wootton Bassett as Royal Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The town of Wootton Bassett has been there for each of our fallen soldiers.  They have never been prompted to do this but have represented the feelings of the majority in this Country.  The Queen knows how worrying it can be having had her Grandson out in Afghanistan.
This town should know just how grateful this country is and a way of doing this would be for the Queen to rename this town 'Royal Wootton Bassett' in honour of their continuing deeds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
